mapper.select: use library select unionid from sys_user where mp_openid = #{mp_openid};
use library select MAX(unionid) from sys_user;
use library insert into sys_user values (#{unionid},#{mp_openid},'','','')
use library select unionid, mp_openid, nickname, avatar, sign from sys_user where unionid = #{unionid};
mapper.update: use library update sys_user set sign = #{sign} where unionid = #{unionid};
